 2023-13152023-12-21NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectOrder - Authorizing the Canadian Energy Regulatory Commission to issue a Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity to NorthRiver Midstream NEBC Connector
PrecisOrder - Directing Commission of the Canadian Energy Regulator to issue CERTIFICATE OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-067 to NorthRiver Midstream NEBC Connector GP Inc. in respect of the proposed construction and operation of the NEBC Connector Project.
AttachmentsAttachment
